00004 static int stbi__pkm_test(stbi__context *s)
00005 {
00006         //      check the magic number
00007         if (stbi__get8(s) != 'P') {
00008                 stbi__rewind(s);
00009                 return 0;
00010         }
00011 
00012         if (stbi__get8(s) != 'K') {
00013                 stbi__rewind(s);
00014                 return 0;
00015         }
00016 
00017         if (stbi__get8(s) != 'M') {
00018                 stbi__rewind(s);
00019                 return 0;
00020         }
00021 
00022         if (stbi__get8(s) != ' ') {
00023                 stbi__rewind(s);
00024                 return 0;
00025         }
00026 
00027         if (stbi__get8(s) != '1') {
00028                 stbi__rewind(s);
00029                 return 0;
00030         }
00031 
00032         if (stbi__get8(s) != '0') {
00033                 stbi__rewind(s);
00034                 return 0;
00035         }
00036 
00037         stbi__rewind(s);
00038         return 1;
00039 }

00043 int      stbi__pkm_test_filename                        (char const *filename)
00044 {
00045    int r;
00046    FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
00047    if (!f) return 0;
00048    r = stbi__pkm_test_file(f);
00049    fclose(f);
00050    return r;
00051 }

00053 int      stbi__pkm_test_file        (FILE *f)
00054 {
00055    stbi__context s;
00056    int r,n = ftell(f);
00057    stbi__start_file(&s,f);
00058    r = stbi__pkm_test(&s);
00059    fseek(f,n,SEEK_SET);
00060    return r;
00061 }
00062 #endif

00065 {
00066    stbi__context s;
00067    stbi__start_mem(&s,buffer, len);
00068    return stbi__pkm_test(&s);

00072 {
00073    stbi__context s;
00074    stbi__start_callbacks(&s, (stbi_io_callbacks *) clbk, user);

00078 static int stbi__pkm_info(stbi__context *s, int *x, int *y, int *comp )
00079 {
00080         PKMHeader header;
00081         unsigned int width, height;
00082 
00083         stbi__getn( s, (stbi_uc*)(&header), sizeof(PKMHeader) );
00084 
00085         if ( 0 != strcmp( header.aName, "PKM 10" ) ) {
00086                 stbi__rewind(s);
00087                 return 0;
00088         }
00089 
00090         width = (header.iWidthMSB << 8) | header.iWidthLSB;
00091         height = (header.iHeightMSB << 8) | header.iHeightLSB;
00092 
00093         *x = s->img_x = width;
00094         *y = s->img_y = height;
00095         *comp = s->img_n = 3;
00096 
00097         stbi__rewind(s);
00098 
00099         return 1;
00100 }
00101 
00102 int stbi__pkm_info_from_memory (stbi_uc const *buffer, int len, int *x, int *y, int *comp )
00103 {
00104         stbi__context s;
00105         stbi__start_mem(&s,buffer, len);
00106         return stbi__pkm_info( &s, x, y, comp );
00107 }

00109 int stbi__pkm_info_from_callbacks (stbi_io_callbacks const *clbk, void *user, int *x, int *y, int *comp)
00110 {
00111         stbi__context s;
00112         stbi__start_callbacks(&s, (stbi_io_callbacks *) clbk, user);
00113         return stbi__pkm_info( &s, x, y, comp );
00114 }

00117 int stbi__pkm_info_from_path(char const *filename,     int *x, int *y, int *comp)
00118 {
00119    int res;
00120    FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
00121    if (!f) return 0;
00122    res = stbi__pkm_info_from_file( f, x, y, comp );
00123    fclose(f);
00124    return res;

00127 int stbi__pkm_info_from_file(FILE *f,                  int *x, int *y, int *comp)
00128 {
00129    stbi__context s;
00130    int res;
00131    long n = ftell(f);
00132    stbi__start_file(&s, f);
00133    res = stbi__pkm_info(&s, x, y, comp);
00134    fseek(f, n, SEEK_SET);
00135    return res;
00136 }

00139 static void * stbi__pkm_load(stbi__context *s, int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00140 {
00141         stbi_uc *pkm_data = NULL;
00142         stbi_uc *pkm_res_data = NULL;
00143         PKMHeader header;
00144         unsigned int width;
00145         unsigned int height;
00146         unsigned int align = 0;
00147         unsigned int bpr;
00148         unsigned int size;
00149         unsigned int compressedSize;
00150 
00151         int res;
00152 
00153         stbi__getn( s, (stbi_uc*)(&header), sizeof(PKMHeader) );
00154 
00155         if ( 0 != strcmp( header.aName, "PKM 10" ) ) {
00156                 return NULL;
00157         }
00158 
00159         width = (header.iWidthMSB << 8) | header.iWidthLSB;
00160         height = (header.iHeightMSB << 8) | header.iHeightLSB;
00161 
00162         *x = s->img_x = width;
00163         *y = s->img_y = height;
00164         *comp = s->img_n = 3;
00165 
00166         compressedSize = etc1_get_encoded_data_size(width, height);
00167 
00168         pkm_data = (stbi_uc *)malloc(compressedSize);
00169         stbi__getn( s, pkm_data, compressedSize );
00170 
00171         bpr = ((width * 3) + align) & ~align;
00172         size = bpr * height;
00173         pkm_res_data = (stbi_uc *)malloc(size);
00174 
00175         res = etc1_decode_image((const etc1_byte*)pkm_data, (etc1_byte*)pkm_res_data, width, height, 3, bpr);
00176 
00177         free( pkm_data );
00178 
00179         if ( 0 == res ) {
00180                 if( (req_comp <= 4) && (req_comp >= 1) ) {
00181                         //      user has some requirements, meet them
00182                         if( req_comp != s->img_n ) {
00183                                 pkm_res_data = stbi__convert_format( pkm_res_data, s->img_n, req_comp, s->img_x, s->img_y );
00184                                 *comp = req_comp;
00185                         }
00186                 }
00187 
00188                 return (stbi_uc *)pkm_res_data;
00189         } else {
00190                 free( pkm_res_data );
00191         }
00192 
00193         return NULL;
00194 }

00196 #ifndef STBI_NO_STDIO
00197 void *stbi__pkm_load_from_file   (FILE *f,                  int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00198 {
00199         stbi__context s;
00200         stbi__start_file(&s,f);
00201         return stbi__pkm_load(&s,x,y,comp,req_comp);
00202 }

00204 void *stbi__pkm_load_from_path             (char const*filename,           int *x, int *y, int *comp, int req_comp)
00205 {
00206    void *data;
00207    FILE *f = fopen(filename, "rb");
00208    if (!f) return NULL;
00209    data = stbi__pkm_load_from_file(f,x,y,comp,req_comp);
00210    fclose(f);
00211    return data;
00212 }
00213 #endif
